aka: Himininn er að hrynja...en stjörnurnar fara þér vel
this_title: The Sky May Be Falling...but the stars look good on you
trans_title: 天空虽沉落，星空化霓裳
Himininn er að hrynja...en stjörnurnar fara þér vel
introduction: A documentary following the young and extremely talanted Icelandic musician Ólafur Arnalds, first at the Icelandic Airwaves and then straight to a full scale UK tour.The documentary focuses on getting to know "Óli" as his friends call him and his music
chinese_title: 天空虽沉落，星空化霓裳
foreign_title: The Sky May Be Falling...but the stars look good on you
